The product comes with a 6 month warranty and has certain features like Active Noise Cancellation ,Dual Beamforming microphones ,Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking, MagSafe Charging Case with speaker and lanyard loop,Up to 6 hours of listening time with a single charge Return Policy.The product is also sweat and water resistant and work with MAG safe charger and apple charger .
Return policy guidelines-: 1)Items are eligible for return within 7 Days of Delivery. 2)All accessories, products and packaging need to be returned in their original condition.

The watch comes with excellent features such as
Bluetooth Calling: make and answer calls directly via a smartwatch,
Multi-sports modes: running, skipping, cycling, table tennis, tennis, football, badminton. and contain 4 sensors: Gravity sensor, pedometer sensor, heart rate sensor (HRS3300), and SPO2 sensor. 2.0 inch Large TFT screen with 435*485 pixels offers a very clear display with super bright colors. Bright Screen Time Setting: Support, Set in the App. Can set 5s, 10s, and 15s to automatically turn off the screen. 200mAh battery life with Wireless charger: 2-5 days for daily use and the standby time up to 7 days.

THE watch comes with silicon straps for your wrists and carries various features such as heartbeat monitoring,walking steps,calorie burned ,can make calls or receive them from the watch screen only.THE product supports wireless charging of 200mah and has a smart fitness tracker system so you can remain up to date with the new technology .

I smartwatch uses a 1.75 inch Large IPS touch screen curved with 2.5D glass and created with a resolution of 320 x 385 pixels. This smartwatch is also packed with a variety of watch faces and is available in black, silver, blue, pink, and red colors. IWO I smartwatch is an IP67 waterproof smartwatch, which means you can wear it when you washing your hands or on rainy days. The device has a heart rate sensor, which collects data on our heart rate over 24 hours. This smartwatch also helps you to control your sleep, thanks to its complete sleep monitor. It also has a pedometer and allows us to control and estimate the calories burned throughout the day. In addition to the features mentioned above, This I smartwatch is equipped with a speaker and microphone that allows you to make calls directly via a smartwatch. Additional Features are Blood oxygen and Blood Pressure Monitor, sports modes, Sedentary Reminder, Find Phone, Bluetooth, and many more. This smartwatch has a 200 mAh battery capacity with 2-3 days of normal usage and 7 days of standby time.

The watch Apple series 7 is a unisex watch that contain various features such as fitness, swimming controls, alram clocks,event reminder ,heart rate monitoring , SPO2,ECG monitoring and exercise tracker as well and is compatible for all the smart devices and is currently available in black colour only .The watch is also sweat and water resistant so you can wear it freely whether its raining or you are up for swimming .

THE watch comes with silicon straps for your wrists and carries various features such as heartbeat monitoring,walking steps,calorie burned ,can make calls or receive them from the watch screen only.THE product supports wireless charging of 200mah and has a smart fitness tracker system so you can remain up to date with the new technology . The product is unisex and its sweat and water resistant too .

THE watch comes up various features such as 2.5 Curved Glass On Screen For Premium Look, Wallpaper Set Option As Watch Face, Both Android And iOS Connectivity, Heart Rate Sensor, Vibration Alert, Motion Sensor, Step Counter / Pedometer, 2 Pin Magnetic Charger and Full Display With Calling Feature Return policy guidelines-: 1)Items are eligible for return within 7 Days of Delivery. 2)All accessories, products and packaging need to be returned in their original condition.

THE watch comes with removable strap and is available in all colors and carries various features such as-: Exercise monitoring pedometer, exercise time, running track, mileage, calories, exercise mode (walking, running, cycling, climbing) Health monitoring Heart rate measurement (hourly measurement), blood pressure measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitoring Smart reminder Sedentary reminder, call reminder, message push (SMS / QQ / WeChat / Skype / Facebook / Twitter / Line / WhatsApp) Other functions long bright display, flip wrist bright screen, custom brightness, silent mode, find bracelet, WeChat sports, shake photos, music control, weather push, stopwatch, alarm.

The MC72 smartwatch has a 1.75‚Äù inch IPS LCD screen. It has a 320 x 385 pixel resolution with full touch screen support. According to its product description, it has up to 80% color saturation, and 1500:1 contrast ratio. The MC72 smartwatch is protected by a 2.5D mineral glass with anti-finger print oil. The overall body, is IP68 waterproof rating. It is splash proof, rain proof and dust proof as well.
The smartwatch runs the MTK2502C processor packed with sensors such as heart rate sensor, ECG and body temperature. It runs the Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity compatible with Android and iOS platform. It has built-in speaker and microphone for its Bluetooth calls. For the battery, the smartwatch has 380 mAh with several days of standby time.
Of course, one of the main features is the Bluetooth call. It has fidelity proof speaker. If features sync caller name, sync phonebook, sync call logs.
Real-time messaging, receive and read SMS messages, social app messages such as Twitter, WeChat, Facebook, QQ and more. It is also packed with sports functions aside from its automatic activity tracking.

THE watch comes with removable strap and is available in all colors and carries various features such as-: Exercise monitoring pedometer, exercise time, running track, mileage, calories, exercise mode (walking, running, cycling, climbing) Health monitoring Heart rate measurement (hourly measurement), blood pressure measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitoring Smart reminder Sedentary reminder, call reminder, message push (SMS / QQ / WeChat / Skype / Facebook / Twitter / Line / WhatsApp) Other functions long bright display, flip wrist bright screen.
